title: Coronavirus: What can the UK learn from Germany on testing?
description: The UK's chief medical adviser says there's "a lot to learn" from Germany, so what has it been doing?
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Soldiers test people for coronavirus symptoms, in Saarbruecken
Germany is preparing to start new tests next week to find out who has already had the coronavirus. The tests will look for antibodies in the blood, with… [+5909 chars]
